Package vehiclesimulationcore

Class Summary
ABSalgorithms  
Behaviours Title: Vehicle Dynamics Simulation Program Description: vehicle dynmaics, braking system simulation Copyright: Copyright (c) 2006 Faculty of Information Technology Engineering at Damascus University Company: FIT
BodyGeom Title: Vehicle Dynamics Simulation Program Description: vehicle dynmaics, braking system simulation Copyright: Copyright (c) 2006 Faculty of Information Technology Engineering at Damascus University body geomerty holds a branch group of it's body components and additional dim data in general the body is not changed, because we change it's parent transform group how ever when enabling the suspension mechanics, we'll change it relatively to the whole vehicle
BrakingDynamics  
Camera Title: Vehicle Dynamics Simulation Program Description: vehicle dynmaics, braking system simulation Copyright: Copyright (c) 2006 Faculty of Information Technology Engineering at Damascus University camera class, since multiple view are to be available, better to hold it in one class better than spreading it into pieces among several classes in the world, one one camera is to be, but may have several views that makes it like multi camera world.
DiagramInfo Title: Vehicle Dynamics Simulation Program Description: vehicle dynmaics, braking system simulation Copyright: Copyright (c) 2006 Faculty of Information Technology Engineering at Damascus University to hold information about the diagram, like labels, Min, Max vals...
Diagrams Title: Vehicle Dynamics Simulation Program Description: vehicle dynmaics, braking system simulation Copyright: Copyright (c) 2006 Faculty of Information Technology Engineering at Damascus University we use it just to create a separte drawing window to be used by the previous class(DrawingTools) before calling this frame to become visible you should set the list and DiagramInfo fields then call it to become visible and it calles the drawing tools to draw on itself
DrawingTools Title: Vehicle Dynamics Simulation Program Description: vehicle dynmaics, braking system simulation Copyright: Copyright (c) 2006 Faculty of Information Technology Engineering at Damascus University to enable drawing lists of values as a diagram over a frame surface we may put further drawing related functions inside this class
KeyboardBehaviours Title: Vehicle Dynamics Simulation Program Description: vehicle dynmaics, braking system simulation Copyright: Copyright (c) 2006 Faculty of Information Technology Engineering at Damascus University - keyboard naviagtion for the vehicle - navigation speed must be considered - KEYRELEASE also will be considerd when enableing speed raise and fade effects - W move forward, S move backwad, D rotate right, A rotate left, Q slide left, E slide Right numbers 1 through 8 are used for different camera settings - camera free navigation arround(only arround) the vehicle is enabled using the arrow keys - Camera is bended to a vehicle, as vehicle moves, the camera(view port, view platform...)
Loaders Title: Vehicle Dynamics Simulation Program Description: vehicle dynmaics, braking system simulation Copyright: Copyright (c) 2006 Faculty of Information Technology Engineering at Damascus University Loaders class, joins multiple loader functionality, to load objects of specific interest for the simulation, and to enable using this class at runtime to load different models class has staic methos for the loading operations, all functions are unified to return a transform group Currently: - .ASE loader written by Trond Abusda 2006 trondabusdal@hotmail.com
-.3ds 3DSLoader:Copyright (c) 2000,2001, 2003 Starfire Research - All Rights Reserved.
SimulateList Title: Vehicle Dynamics Simulation Program Description: vehicle dynmaics, braking system simulation Copyright: Copyright (c) 2006 Faculty of Information Technology Engineering at Damascus University test class for list simulation application on vehicle Coordinate List Application: We got a sampled linked list of coordinate values, apply it to the vehicle model in time continuous form, make it match a real world time model.
Terrain Title: Vehicle Dynamics Simulation Program Description: vehicle dynmaics, braking system simulation Copyright: Copyright (c) 2006 Faculty of Information Technology Engineering at Damascus University Terrain class holds multiple runtime created worlds, environments, for more realistic simulation.
VehicleGeom Title: Vehicle Dynamics Simulation Program Description: vehicle dynmaics, braking system simulation Copyright: Copyright (c) 2006 Faculty of Information Technology Engineering at Damascus University VehicleGeom constsis of two classes: BodyGeom and WheelGeom
this class holds information and data of the vehicle geometry and responsible
for all transformations application on it through applying appropriate behaviors
separation of the vehicle model into two component classes is better for organizational issue so the VehicleGeom wont be a miss with so many feilds and members the vehicle has one TransformGroup for it's body ( and thus a it's own coordinate system you can say) and a TransformGroup for each wheel( and thus a separate coordinate sytem for each wheel) wheels are relative to the body, the body is relative to world coordinates we assign a behaviour with the vehicle to enable crusiing using the keyboard
VehiclesCoords Title: Vehicle Dynamics Simulation Program Description: vehicle dynmaics, braking system simulation Copyright: Copyright (c) 2006 Faculty of Information Technology Engineering at Damascus University model specific coords currenlty they are taken fron 3DSMAX assuming model head towards negative X, perpendecular with z, and y is up data specific information, path info for model files...
VehiclesCoords.SportTVW Title: Vehicle Dynamics Simulation Program Description: vehicle dynmaics, braking system simulation Copyright: Copyright (c) 2006 Faculty of Information Technology Engineering at Damascus University this internal class is the case to load the first model SPORTVW model
WheelGeom Title: Vehicle Dynamics Simulation Program Description: vehicle dynmaics, braking system simulation Copyright: Copyright (c) 2006 Faculty of Information Technology Engineering at Damascus University WheelGeom class: it holds the wheel geometry transform group and the parant transform group which represensts the coordinate system of the wheel located at it's center it also has the dimension and some related data so two Transform groups: enables rotaion arroud it's axon not arround the vehicle center
World Title: Vehicle Dynamics Simulation Program Description: vehicle dynmaics, braking system simulation Copyright: Copyright (c) 2006 Faculty of Information Technology Engineering at Damascus University World is the class that holds the VirtualUniverse and takes care of collaborating all other geometry classes with independence of the program UI.
